casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Rodney K. JETER. No. 556P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 6, 2005. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of September 2005 by Defendant for Reconsideration and Revisit of the State of N.C. Application to Appeal:

"Motion Dismissed. By order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of October 2005."
